data.title: Yearly & Monthly weather
data.meta_description: Port Mathurin, Mauritius - Climate and weather forecast by month. Detailed climate information with charts - average monthly weather with temperature, pressure, humidity, precipitation, wind, daylight, sunshine, visibility, and UV index data. The month with the most rainfall in Port Mathurin, Mauritius, is March, when the rain falls for 21.9 days and typically aggregates up to 140mm (5.51") of precipitation. February is the warmest month of the year in Port Mathurin, Mauritius, registering average temperatures as high as 27.7°C (81.9°F) and as low as 27°C (80.6°F).
data.text:
Average temperature

Port Mathurin, Mauritius

The warmest month (with the highest average high temperature) is February (27.7°C).

The month with the lowest average high temperature is September (23°C).

The month with the highest average low temperature is February (27°C).

The coldest month (with the lowest average low temperature) is August (22.1°C).

Average daylight / Average sunshine

Port Mathurin, Mauritius

The month with the longest days is December (Average daylight: 13h and 18min).

The month with the shortest days is June (Average daylight: 11h and 0min).

The month with the most sunshine is December (Average sunshine: 9h and 48min).

The month with the least sunshine is July (Average sunshine: 6h and 6min).

Average sunshine days

Port Mathurin, Mauritius

The month with the most sunshine days is November (9.2 days).

The month with the least sunshine days is February (4.4 days).

Average UV index

Port Mathurin, Mauritius

The months with the highest UV index are January, February, March, April, November and December (UV index 7).

The months with the lowest UV index are May, June, July, August, September and October (UV index 6).

Average visibility

Port Mathurin, Mauritius

The months with the highest visibility are January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November and December (10km).

The months with the lowest visibility are January, February, March, April, May, June, July, August, September, October, November and December (10km).
